text: Jo log aisay rasool nabi ummi ka ittabaa kertay hain jin ko woh log apney pass toraat-o-injeel mein likha hua patay hain. Woh inn ko nek baaton ka hukum farmatay hain aur buri baaton say mana kertay hain aur pakeezah cheezon ko halal batatay hain aur gandi cheezon ko inn per haram farmatay hain aur inn logon per jo bojh aur toq thay unn ko door kertay hain. So jo log iss nabi per eman latay hain aur inn ki himayat kertay hain aur inn ki madad kertay hain aur iss noor ka ittabaa kertay hain jo inn kay sath bheja gaya hai aisay log poori falah paney walay hain
